body:
**Scenario:** Accidentally had mismatched input types on my workflow argument struct. As a result, the workflow was failing immediately. 

**Issue:** tctl wf desc tells me that my workflow failed but gives me zero context as to why. I have to either run wf show or go to temporal-web. It would be nice if "wf desc" pulls a little bit of extra data (even if it has to make another server call) so that it was obvious to me with the command what happened.
title: tctl wf desc -w <workflowid> shows failure but not failure reason
